info.task: close nested modal dialog using button
info.title: Close a nested modal dialog using a button

setupScript.name: openVerificationResultDialogAndFocusCloseButton
setupScript.description: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' dialog followed by the 'Verification Result' dialog, and sets focus on the 'Close' button inside the second dialog

user: With focus on the 'Close' button inside a modal dialog, press the button to close the dialog.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Close' button inside a modal dialog, press the button to close the dialog.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Role of the focused element ('button') is conveyed
Name of the focused element ('Verify Address') is conveyed
